title: Matt and Chris
description: This week Matt and I sit down to catch up on the news, swap stories and meander through conversation.  We talk about the endless stream of men that resemble Matt, updates on my Corvette "GT3" project, C7 Z06 overheating, Carplay & Android Auto integration, Matt's trepidation in daily driving a Focus RS, Lexus IS & RC lineup, the new 2016 Cadillact CTS-V and how it stacks up against ze Germans, rising Skyline R32 prices, my adventures in carbon fiber and the Top Gear crew's move to Amazon.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
